events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position and have begun processing it.
The application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster based on the candidate's background in software development.
Assigned a recruiter to the candidate to begin scheduling initial screening and further communications regarding the software engineer role.
Conducted the initial screening call with the candidate to assess their technical skills and fit for the engineering team.
The candidate responded promptly with additional portfolio details and confirmed availability for the technical interview.
Scheduled the technical interview with the candidate and engineering panel for next Wednesday at 10 AM.
The technical interview was successfully completed; candidate demonstrated strong problem-solving and coding skills.
Scheduled the HR interview following the positive technical interview to discuss company culture and benefits.
HR interview completed; candidate expressed enthusiasm about joining the company and aligned well with organizational values.
Extended the formal job offer to the candidate outlining salary, benefits, and start date for the software engineer position.
Received positive feedback from the candidate accepting the terms of the offer and eager to proceed with onboarding.
Candidate formally accepted the job offer, confirming start date and expressing excitement to join the engineering team.
Onboarding process started for the new software engineer, including account setups and introduction to team members.
The hiring process is now successfully closed; the new engineer has joined the team and commenced work.
